summary: Changes every single alchemy table in Skyrim. (Enchantment tables coming soon!)
descriptionHtml:
Better Alchemy Tables and soon Enchantment tables.

Ive completely changed all most evey alchemy table in Skyrim.
each one I have done will look different. I did not copy and paste anything.
I have gone in to every cell, world space in Skyrim to enhance the look and feel to the table.
I thought it was getting old looking at the exact same alchemy table ive ever seen. soooo thats where the idea of this mod came from lol.

Short Summery:

Changes All but 3 Alchemy Tables in Skyrim. (2 of witch are in test cell, the other in breezehome.)
-adds ingredients on them
-adds potions on them
-adds satchels and strong boxes on them

Hope you like and enjoy :)
author: SpiderAkiraC
